did.abstract: The Benjamin F. Hart papers span the period 1836 to 1843 and consist of two documents: a certificate that certifies Benjamin F. Hart is a Master Mason of the St. Andrew's Lodge #7 of the Freemasons, dated 1838; and Hart's last will and testament, dated 1843.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The papers were formally accessioned in 1977.
